ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Have taqwa of Him who has supplied you with what you know,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Fear Him who has bestowed on you what you know,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Have fear of Him Who has provided you with all the (good) things you know;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have fear of the One who has bestowed upon you all that you know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Fear Him Who has aided you with the things you know.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And have Taqwa of Him, fear Him Who has aided you with all (good things) that you know."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And be careful of (your duty to) Him Who has given you abundance of what you know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and fear Him who has succoured you with what you know,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Keep your duty toward Him Who hath aided you with (the good things) that ye know,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: fear Him who has aided you with all that you know --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And fear Him Who hath aided you with that which ye know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Be wary of Him who has provided you with whatever you know,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Yea, fear Him Who has bestowed on you freely all that ye know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And keep your duty to Him, fear Him Who has aided you with all (good things) that you know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Fear Him who has given you all the things you know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And reverence Him, who supplied you with everything you know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And fear He who provided you with that which you know,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:132] And fear Him Who has provided you, Who has been gracious to you, in a way that you know,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Keep your duty towards Him) fear Him (who hath aided) provided (you with (the good things) that ye know),
